name: Ode 2 the deep
description:
The underwater city is running out of air! You must connect the O2 pump to them, but your hose is not long enough!

Use the W, A, S, D keys to control your submarine. Collect coins to increase the length of your hose.

Use switches and buttons to open doors. If a crate gets stuck or goes too far, sit still for a moment and it will be magnetized towards you.

Try to find and collect the hidden trophies! You can find the completion percentage in the pause menu.
